speaker: Episode 6
lines: Here There Be Gerblins - Chapter 6

speaker: Griffin
lines: Previously, on the Adventure Zone…

speaker: Griffin
lines: As you step foot into the chamber, that is completely made out of black glass, and as you move towards him, you see a single figure that is dwarven in shape, but it’s so badly burned, with, on its hand, a silvery glove, a silvery gauntlet. Gundren reaches over very quickly, snatches it up and puts it on his right hand. And he is engulfed in flame.

speaker: Travis
lines: I regret this immediately!

speaker: Griffin
lines: He goes flying out of the room, and Killian says,

speaker: Killian
lines: We need to get him before he destroys the whole world.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The four of you in this wagon crest a hill. As you look down you actually see a convoy of wagons, that have been completely destroyed, completely burned out. And you see laid out next to them a few charred bodies that you make out to actually be orcish. You see four human figures who are sort of picking over the remains. And they have their own cage with a adolescent orc boy in it.

speaker: Clint
lines: I am going to cast thaumaturgy, and I’m going to yell,

speaker: Merle
lines: Platoon one attack from the east! Platoon two attack from the west!

speaker: Griffin
lines: The two ruffians split off and [laughing] start running in either direction. You find some keys on one of those two dead bandits and you pop open the cage, and the orcish boy doesn’t seem especially grateful. He just sort of starts to walk away.

speaker: Clint
lines: So he’s an emorc.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay, bye!

speaker: Griffin
lines: That was pretty good.

speaker: The Announcer
lines: Someone flies. Someone dies. Seriously, this week someone flies and someone dies. It’s The Adventure Zone!

speaker: [Theme music
lines: Déjà Vu by Mort Garson]

speaker: Travis
lines: Is there anything fun in the cart?

speaker: Griffin
lines: You actually find the stash of these of these ruffians, you find a deck of playing cards,that are probably not legit? Probably probably some [Travis Yeah!] cheatin’ cards, is what we’ll call ‘em.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeeeah!

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’m guessing that Magnus is gonna take that, since you’ve got sort of a… what was that Mel Gibson river boat gambling movie?

speaker: Clint
lines: Maverick.

speaker: Travis
lines: Maverick.

speaker: Justin
lines: Man Without A Face.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’ve got kind of a Man Without A—

speaker: Griffin
lines: You—

speaker: Clint
lines: Mad Max.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You pick that up and you find four different sacks of coins, that are sort of unevenly filled. You think that maybe it sort of refers to the pay grade that each of these ruffians had on them. But all told there is about two hundred and twenty gold pieces—

speaker: Clint
lines: [Satisfied] Hah-hoh.

speaker: Justin
lines: Great.

speaker: Griffin
lines: In between them. So you pick all that up, too.

speaker: Travis
lines: To Phandalin!

speaker: Griffin
lines: The rest of the stuff is just kinda either junk or, you know, burned up supplies.

speaker: Taako
lines: Shouldn’t we leave two? Shouldn’t we leave two bags? Those other guys will be back.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Taako, what’s that over there? Okay, let’s get in the cart. C’mon.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You—

speaker: Justin
lines: Are we taking their cart? Or are we getting back in our cart?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Your cart is much better off. Their cart—

speaker: Justin
lines: Oh, thank god.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I mean, they weren’t dumpster divers, but they were living like dumpster divers.

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m with you.

speaker: Travis
lines: Livin’ like they were diving.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Pretty good.

speaker: Travis
lines: Thank you.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, so the four of you finish up your trek to Phandalin. It is dusk. You’ve made very very good time getting here, but you can tell by the fiery, burnt path that has been carved in the ground that you are, you have not beaten Gundren to the scene. You follow this path into town. Fortunately, no buildings have been, you know, destroyed. It doesn’t look like Godzilla just rushed through here. The streets in Phandalin, while crude, are fairly wide, so the damage has been minimal, but nobody’s outside. Nobody’s outside. Everybody has locked themselves away in their building, in their homes. They can tell that things are pretty bad right now. You roll into Phandalin and you follow the path, and where the path terminates is the local bar.

speaker: Travis
lines: Mhm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Which goes the path basically burns straight into the front door which is pretty badly scorched but intact.

speaker: Justin
lines: I guess we’ll— Let’s head into the bar, see what’s going on.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You walk towards the door of the bar, and a familiar—

speaker: Justin
lines: Wait, wait, wait, what do I see in there? Perception check.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, make a perception check into the bar?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, you… go ahead and roll it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: 21? You can’t really see a whole lot, except that for the fact that it’s very bright in there. It’s exceptionally bright. And you hear the voice of Barry Bluejeans, actually, shouting. But to— there is no response to Barry Bluejeans shouting, to his cries for relief.

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Concerned] Oh. Let’s run in.

speaker: Griffin
lines: As you move towards the door Barry Bluejeans actually comes barrelling out at you. Let me re— how did hi— what was his voice? Was it kind of New York-y?

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, it was.

speaker: Justin
lines: Sure.

speaker: Clint
lines: But of course his voice would be slightly altered if he’s on fire.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He is not on fire as he is running out of the building, but he he actually ducks— oh, no, I just broke my pen. Oh, bummer.

speaker: Travis
lines: Alright, let’s stop the podcast.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Stop the podcast, everybody, I broke my pen! Hold on, I can fix it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Whining] This is my stylus, I spent a lot of money on it. I breaked it. There it is. Uh. He is not on fire, but as he runs through the door he sort of ducks just in time to dodge a fireball that has been thrown at him. And he sees you four and says,

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Oh, my god, ya back! You guys, you gotta help me, I’ve never seen it— him like this— well, obviously, I’ve never seen him engulfed in flames and all magical and shit, but if things are really bad, you guys, you gotta calm him down.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And Killian says,

speaker: Killian
lines: You would be wise to listen to him, we can’t fight him right now. If we try to fight him, we’re gonna lose. He’s more powerful than anybody you guys have ever met. That’s not an empty promise, he will incinerate anybody who defies him. We gotta calm him down and try and get that glove off of him.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Which means Magnus will attack, right?

speaker: Travis
lines: No— okay—

speaker: Travis
lines: In a surprise moment! [Pause] Magnus calmly walks into the bar.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Gundren actually stops you before you can do that. He blows open the door of the bar and walks out, so now he is standing out in the streets with everyone. Kind of a high noon standoff with Gundren standing sort of in the middle of the circle composed of you three and Barry and Killian. And he says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: [Growling] Why would you wanna stop me?

speaker: Griffin
lines: He says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: I finally have enough power to get rid of those god damn orcs.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Gundren…

speaker: Griffin
lines: His voice has changed, it’s almost like he’s been… I don’t know, he’s been infused with something that he can’t control.

speaker: Justin
lines: I cast charm person… on Gundren.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Hesitantly] Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Do we need to roll initiative?

speaker: Justin
lines: No.

speaker: Travis
lines: No.

speaker: Justin
lines: [Crosstalk] No. Not yet. We’re not fighting him.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: [Laughing] We cannot stress enough how much we are not fighting him.

speaker: Justin
lines: We are not fighting him. He has to make a Wisdom saving throw.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I rolled an 18. [Pause] That’s gonna do it, I think. He is not charmed. Um, and—

speaker: Justin
lines: And I cast it again.

speaker: Justin
lines: I have three spell slots, I’mma cast it again.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He actually, after you cast it the first time, he looks at you. His eyes are just fire now. His and that’s not like a description of his attractiveness, he’s not looking at you smokingly, he is— his eyes are literally fireballs.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Gundren, you have to listen, the glove is consuming you from the inside out. Remember your father in the cave! If you don’t remove the glove, you’re going to die!

lines: He says, “I—

lines: [Crosstalk] How close am— how close am I to him?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, you—

lines: [Crosstalk] We’re not going to attack him.

speaker: Clint
lines: [Quietly] No.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He— You’re about 8 feet away from him? He says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: I can control it…

speaker: Magnus
lines: You can’t, look at yourself, this isn’t you.

speaker: Gundren
lines: You don’t know what I’m like. [Laughing ruefully]

speaker: Magnus
lines: Listen— the rage—

lines: [Crosstalk] I slowly walk up towards him…

speaker: Griffin
lines: He turns his, he turns his flaming eyes towards you now.

speaker: Clint
lines: [Soothingly] That’s fine. I just remind him,

lines: We’re cousins, we have the same bloodline—

speaker: Gundren
lines: What’s my middle name? What, no, fuck it, what’s my first name?

lines: Your first name… is Gundren.

speaker: Merle
lines: Your middle name is Lou. Gundren Lou.

speaker: Gundren
lines: That’s right.

lines: Gundren Lou Albano.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I guess y—

lines: I put my hands on the glove—

lines: It burns you very very badly. You—

lines: [Crosstalk] I don’t care.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You take, you take—

speaker: Clint
lines: [Insistent] I don’t care.

lines: [Crosstalk] Wait, no, you’re taking damage.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You take five points of damage.

speaker: Clint
lines: I’m gonna help him control it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: Wait, take that damage.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You put your hands on the glove, and he actually steps away and seems to get more angry.

speaker: Gundren
lines: What are you doing?! [Yelling] This is mine!

lines: We’re the same bloodline, I can help you control it!

lines: I don’t need your help controlling it!

lines: [Passive-aggressive] Fine! Go! Do what you want, I don’t care!

lines: Okay.

lines: He is [Justin I need to get—] all this while, the longer that you guys talk, it seemed like the fire was dying down a little bit, but as you started to touch the glove and he got very defensive and it picked up a little bit and he’s back [Justin I need—] to like, inferno status.

lines: Okay. Listen, guys. I need to do a check to see if him being on fire gives me the idea for spicy food.

lines: That’s really important. And then we can figure out a solution.

lines: That is our overall taco quest.

lines: [Crosstalk] Well maybe [Griffin It’s not your—] it’s Taako’s curse, is he’s a dullard until he figures out the taco thing, because so much of his mental processes is taking up, like, by figuring out tacos.

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m not gonna be able to— can we just talk— can we… we can’t really, like, discuss this… can we talk, do we have time to talk about it? Griffin, can we sort of talk out of character [Griffin Yeah, sure!] about the plan a little bit? Okay. Listen. I can’t— the only other thing I have, like, in terms of things I might be able to do to help, I tried charming him, that didn’t work… mage… I mean I could try mage hand, but I don’t think I could use mage hand to pull the glove off.

speaker: Clint
lines: I have create water, which makes it rain in a 30-foot cube.

speaker: Justin
lines: Hmm.

speaker: Travis
lines: It seems to me like the key to this is not spells or attacks or anything, it’s just talking, that what we need to do is calm him down, and— because I think that the glove has taken over, and it’s a little bit of like a split personality thing?

speaker: Justin
lines: [Crosstalk, sucks in breath through teeth] Yeah, right right right.

speaker: Travis
lines: And we need to be able to appeal to Gundren, and get him to take the glove off. I don’t think that we’re going to be able to wrest it from him, or beat him.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay. Who’s got the highest charisma?

speaker: Travis
lines: I’ve got +1.

speaker: Justin
lines: Mine’s -1.

speaker: Clint
lines: Mine’s +3.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay. Why don’t we just have— just let’s just be simple. Why don’t we just have Merle talk to him.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes.

speaker: Justin
lines: He’s a cleric, he has a very soothing presence, how ‘bout Merle just talks him through it. They’re related— just, don’t— listen, Merle, don’t… touch him.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Don’t touch him, don’t advance on him, think like a hostage negotiator.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright.

speaker: Justin
lines: Just talk.

lines: Are we back in the game, now?

lines: Yes.

speaker: Clint
lines: We’re back in the game.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. [Imitating a video game unpausing] Badoop badoop! That’s the unpause sound.

speaker: Merle
lines: [Soothingly] Now Gundren… you know me. Remember Christmases at Aunt Blarg’s house?

speaker: Merle
lines: Remember, and we’d sit around and drink mulled wine…

speaker: Gundren
lines: I miss her so much!

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh, Aunt Blarg! She was a good woman!

speaker: Gundren
lines: She was until she was killed by those GOD DAMN ORCS!

speaker: Merle
lines: Well… well that was never proven. And you know what? She loved you, and she— y’know, she gave every year to the Orc Benevolent Fund.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I know, and that’s what made her death at their hands so ironic! SO PAINFULLY IRONIC!

speaker: Merle
lines: It is painfully ironic, but is this what she would have wanted? Would she have wanted you to do this, to not only kill all these indiscriminate orcs but burn your own ass up at the same time? I don’t think so. Come on, why don’t you just take the gauntlet off and we can all talk about it?

speaker: Gundren
lines: I don’t think I can.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He’s looking—

speaker: Merle
lines: [Crosstalk] Well sure you can! You’re the strongest dwarf I know! I mean, down through the years, I’ve always turned to you—

speaker: Gundren
lines: Bronze Strongarm is the strongest dwarf. And we both know that.

speaker: Gundren
lines: So don’t bullshit me.

speaker: Merle
lines: He’s good at arm wrestling, but you… you are strong at heart.

speaker: Gundren
lines: [Sighs] I’m s— I’m sc—

speaker: Merle
lines: [Crosstalk] I’ve always looked up to you.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I’m scared.

speaker: Merle
lines: You’ve always been my hero. Don’t be scared. Look, we’re all here together.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I was a fireball earlier and it hurt.

speaker: Merle
lines: I know. Oh, that must have hurt so bad—

speaker: Gundren
lines: It burned a lot.

speaker: Merle
lines: Aren’t you tired of hurting? Aren’t you tired of fire and burning?

speaker: Gundren
lines: I’m pretty sleepy.

speaker: Merle
lines: Just, just, just, just why don’t you just take a deep breath—

speaker: Merle
lines: And take off the gauntlet. And everything’s gonna be okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The fire in his eyes is gone, he’s back to normal dwarf eyes. His hair is gone. That shit just burned right up. And his clothes are a little tattered, got some burn holes in ‘em, but otherwise he seems to be calming down, pretty significantly, and he says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: I’m so sorry tha— I killed a bunch of orcs earlier. You didn’t see that, did ya?

speaker: Merle
lines: We’re gonna blame it on the dumpster divers. Just for, you know, the public.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I don’t know what you’re talkin’ about, but… I’m just so tired.

speaker: Merle
lines: I know. I know! Why don’t you, why don’t you close your eyes for a little bit, take a little nippy nap—

speaker: Gundren
lines: You’re right, I would love a nippy nap.

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh, just think about that, and when you get up, we’ll [flounders] we’ll go spelunking. You know, and share stories about Aunt Blarg.

speaker: Gundren
lines: [Softly] I miss her.

speaker: Merle
lines: I know you do.

speaker: Gundren
lines: [Sighs] Okay. You guys are right. I can’t control this thing. And I think it’s time we—

lines: [Laughs] Suddenly, you all hear the sound. You hear this sound, actually [imitating the sound of an arrow flying to its target and hitting] sssshheew-THUNK.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh no.

lines: I know what that is.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And Gundren takes a sudden step forward, like, “[surprised gasp] Uh!” And turns to the side, and puts his hands, like, over his shoulders, reaching towards his back, and you can see an arrow lodged in his back. And you can make a Perception check if you wanna try and discover the source.

speaker: Taako
lines: Aw gee.

speaker: Merle
lines: I have a guess.

lines: Alright, 11.

It’s— his arms are just two columns of flame, and he’s growing [Justin laughing quietly] and bouts of flame are sort of ripping off of his body and cutting entire buildings in half. He starts screaming,

lines: Who did this?!

lines: The three of you dive into the well. It is fairly deep. You fall very slowly about 40 feet into the well. And as you look up through a small circle of light, you see the night sky grow red. And then suddenly you hear one final scream from Gundren Rockseeker, and then all of a sudden all you see is flame above you. Just a—

lines: [Crosstalk] Well, tits.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The well is actually— the interior of the well is made of sort of, these large cobblestones, you think maybe with enough—

speaker: Clint
lines: AKA, climbable.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, it’s climbable, you think maybe you could with a good enough climbing check you could… maybe one of you could sort of shimmy your way up and maybe drop a rope for the others.

speaker: Clint
lines: I say Magnus.

lines: Wait, hold on— I take her crossbow.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay! Yeah, you take her crossbow from her unconscious body.

lines: Nice!

lines: And I wake her up with the crossbow pointed at her.

speaker: Griffin

lines: Okay, she’s dead, let’s go!

speaker: Griffin
lines: She is thoroughly concussed.

speaker: Travis
lines: I don’t want to just leave her…

speaker: Merle
lines: We— no, we gotta take her.

speaker: Taako
lines: She’s got a magic feather duster! And if I know anything about magic, that’s gonna be good for dusting.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Justin, with your magic feather duster, and your magic umbrella, so far you’re looking kinda Poppins-esque.

lines: All you need is a Bag of Holding. Because she actually had one of those in the movie.

lines: He means Mary Poppins!

lines: You got very confused there.

lines: Okay. I climb the well, I drop a rope—

lines: Okay, I climb the well.

speaker: Clint
lines: I fly out of the well!

speaker: Griffin
lines: This isn’t The Secret.

lines: I got, what is it— acrobatics, or athletics?

lines: Is there not a climbing skill?

speaker: Travis
lines: No. I think it’s athletics. Yeah. I rolled a 19.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Yeah, that is sufficient. It’s a looong hike up to the top, but you manage to crest the top of the well. The the structure at the top of the well, right? The I don’t know what it would be called, the top of the well with the bucket and the rope and pulley and all that shit, is gone. It’s just gone. It’s gone. And as you look around you realize everything’s gone. Phandalin’s gone. As you put the arm up over the edge of the well to pull yourself up you hear that same [plink] sound.

speaker: Justin
lines: [Quietly] Ohh.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Because the the entire town, where it used to be, you look around and for about a half-mile in, in diameter, all that you can see is black glass. A circle of black glass on the ground.

speaker: Travis
lines: Well, this all sucks.

speaker: Justin
lines: It does suck.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay. I drop the rope, and yell down,

speaker: Magnus
lines: Tie it around her before you climb up!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. We’ll say, we could do a bunch of strength checks here, but that would be boring. You manage to get everybody up out of the well. Including Killian, that’s a group effort, pulling her up, I mean she’s a big orc woman.

lines: Griffin, can I do an arcana check on the feather duster to figure out what it is?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, sure.

speaker: Griffin
lines: 15? It is just what it looks like. It is an enchanted feather duster that—

lines: Mine is…

lines: Yeah, mine’s a 6.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. You guys don’t actually need a particularly high check because there’s nothing in, this field of black— this circle of black glass, except, again, in the very epicenter, a burned out, blackened, dwarven figure with its right arm in the air, and on the end of the right arm is a silvery gauntlet.

lines: Mhm.

lines: I think you were faking that one.

lines: No, I’m dumb, but I’m super willful. I mean it wasn’t even a thing. For me. I was fine.

lines: She looks at— you see that same look in her face that she had when she saw you’d defeated Magic Brian, where she is just thoroughly impressed with you guys. And she says—

lines: Yeah.

lines: And she says,

lines: I… you guys… where did you guys come from?

lines: Your mama.

lines: That’s a pretty good burn.

lines: Oh— we don’t— we—

lines: Oh, no, no, not the backstory!

lines: She says.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She says,

lines: Mhm.

lines: The [makes a static noise].

speaker: Killian

lines: She got as far as “collect it” and I started sprinting back towards the glove.

lines: [Laughing] Okay.

lines: Merle, should we let her go?

lines: Wear it on a chain around your neck. Wear it on a chain around your neck!

speaker: Griffin

lines: Don’t put it on, don’t put it on. Don’t put—

lines: Okay.

lines: Uh.

lines: Thanks for the healing. I guess it’s kind of the least you could do since the three of you… landed on me. And did not heal me.

speaker: Magnus
lines: It’s a tiny well!

lines: It was your fault!

lines: Well, that’s… debatable. There’ll be time for blame later,

lines: We need to get somewhere where the ground’s not as hard.

lines: Or glassy.

lines: Or glassy, yeah.

lines: Or full of dead people that we failed to save.

lines: There’s no, like, corpses. They—

lines: Well, I imagine it’s kind of like Pompeii, where the ash is probably pretty mixed in.

lines: There’s no ash. It’s just black glass, almost— it burned the ground. It was so hot that everything just sort of evaporated. You might be breathing in some folks.

lines: Were the people of this town at least, like, really, like, not so nice people? Something that just, like softens the blow?

lines: Griffin, quick question Are her feet kind of sliding around the black glass? Like, it’s a little bit humorous if it wasn’t such a serious situation.

lines: Oh shit, Dad.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Charles.

speaker: Clint
lines: The Man!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Charles!

speaker: Taako
lines: I told you, it was a very powerful god, it’s pronounced “Them-an!” We’ve been over this so many times!

speaker: Killian
lines: About five more seconds.

speaker: Taako
lines: Well—

speaker: Magnus
lines: What’s your deal?

speaker: Killian
lines: My deal is—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [WOOSH noise] You hear a sound from up above and—

speaker: Travis
lines: [Deep, commanding voice] “Don’t tell them!”

speaker: Griffin
lines: The cloud, ah—

speaker: Travis
lines: [Same voice] “Keep it to yourself!”

speaker: Clint
lines: [Adopting the voice] “Killiaaaan!”

speaker: Griffin
lines: From a cloud hanging above the city, it— the cloud just sort of bursts apart, and you see a shape flying down and—

speaker: Travis
lines: It’s the angel of Barry Bluejeans!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Suddenly a seraphim reveals himself to you.

speaker: Barry Bluejeans
lines: Y’all did great.

speaker: Griffin
lines: A figure is flying down. It has burst through the cloud, and it lands about in the spot that Killian pointed to, and she starts walking towards it. She’s like,

speaker: Killian
lines: C’mon!

speaker: Travis
lines: And it’s Al.

speaker: Killian
lines: Get the lead out!

speaker: Magnus
lines: I don’t know why you haven’t leaped yet, Killian.

speaker: Griffin
lines: God, Travis, you’re giving me ideas now.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’ve got, like, four pages of campaign notes. I’ll throw them shits in the garbage.

speaker: Clint
lines: Saaaam!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, boy.

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh, boy.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You move towards the shape and as you get closer to it, you see a… glass sphere with some solid metal trimming around it. It’s about the size of a Volkswagen Beetle.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh.

speaker: Griffin
lines: This episode is sponsored also by Volkswagen. And inside is four chairs and Killian taps on the glass, and an aperture opens that she climbs through and sits in and straps herself into one of the chairs.

speaker: Magnus
lines: It’s really lucky that there’s not just, like, three chairs, or like 16 chairs.

speaker: Merle
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Magnus
lines: That’s very fitting. There’s four of us, right?

speaker: Griffin
lines: She says,

speaker: Killian
lines: It’s best if you don’t think about it.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay. Done.

speaker: Merle
lines: Are there Luna bars?

speaker: Killian
lines: Uh, yeah, there’s lots of Luma b— Luna bars in here.

speaker: Merle
lines: Yeah!

speaker: Killian
lines: There’s a— We got a med kit, if you want to stitch yourself up. I can prep some tea. It’s not great tea.

speaker: Travis
lines: With the delicious vitamins in Luna bars, we don’t even need a med kit.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s ri—

speaker: Clint
lines: That’s right, Travis. Because Luna bars are graded A, for deliciousness and nutritiousness.

speaker: Griffin
lines: None of those start with “A”, though.

speaker: Travis
lines: For “A Delicious Bar”.

speaker: Justin
lines: So, if you wondered what Dungeons & Dragons is, that’s how you play it. The end.

speaker: Griffin
lines: We’ve got—

speaker: Justin
lines: That’s just one example of how to play Dungeons [dramatic pause] & Dragons.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Buy your own kits at home and supplement your own Luna bar advertisements!

speaker: Justin
lines: Say whatever dumb shit that comes to your mind!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You can advertise whatever you want! Geico… Mattresses…

speaker: Travis
lines: Geico mattresses?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Whatever.

speaker: Travis
lines: “We insure the greatest sleep you’ve ever had”.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She’s like,

speaker: Killian
lines: Hop in! Come on, get the lead out.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, Magnus hops in and picks the best seat, the one up front next to the driver.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You got shotgun.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yep.

speaker: Griffin
lines: There doesn’t seem to be any kind of steering apparatus.

speaker: Travis
lines: I know how this works. We do it with our brains.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Well, then, you’re gonna crash. You’re gonna crash into the sun.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, I turn to Taako and I say,

speaker: Merle
lines: It’ll be alright, come on.

speaker: Taako
lines: I’m scared.

speaker: Merle
lines: Let’s get in the big glass ball.

speaker: Taako
lines: Okay.

speaker: Merle
lines: ‘Kay. It’ll be fun!

speaker: Taako
lines: Don’t have to tell me twice.

speaker: Justin
lines: Arcana check!

speaker: Justin
lines: 24. I know exactly what it is. I built it. [More laughter] My dad made it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It is a vehicle. You are detecting… a magical signature. You don’t know what it is, but you are detecting it at the top of the—

speaker: Justin
lines: This isn’t a detection. It’s more about, like, against my knowledge of the arcane arts.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, you don’t— there is a— Okay, you recognize the enchantment. There is a compression enchantment. It’s almost like there is something in there that is very big, that by magical means has been made very small.

speaker: Taako
lines: Okay, guys, here’s—

speaker: Travis
lines: It’s a TARDIS!

speaker: Clint
lines: We get into the TARDIS.

speaker: Taako
lines: Here’s what we’re dealing with it’s a compression… magic.

speaker: Travis
lines: We’re all already inside the ball. [Laughing] You’re just standing outside.

speaker: Taako
lines: What we’ve got here—

speaker: Justin
lines: I go inside.

speaker: Griffin
lines: “This is your standard order magic compression thing”.

speaker: Taako
lines: What we got here’s compression… magic….

speaker: Travis
lines: It’ll make you look slimmer. You wear it underneath your clothes. It compresses. It’s…

speaker: Griffin
lines: It lifts and separates.

speaker: Merle
lines: [Persuasively] I’ll give you a Luna bar if you sit down.

speaker: Taako
lines: Alright, I sit down.

speaker: Merle
lines: Open up!

speaker: Griffin
lines: While you are feeding him— While you open up the hangar and fly the airplane in Killian shuts the door, taps on her bracer a couple of times, and from above you, there was a very small sort of overhead trunk on the top of the ball that opens up, and a giant balloon pops out. Basically a hot air balloon, that doesn’t seem to have any sort of brazier filling it. It’s just sort of filling up on its own, and before you know it the four of you are off. And you’re floating through the night sky. It’s a beautiful, clear night aside from the horrible carnage beneath which almost serves as a giant, black mirror for the night sky above.

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s still kind of funny.

speaker: Griffin
lines: It’s not funny as much as it is, like, weirdly beautiful. Because other than a few clouds the sky is clear. You can see there are two moons shining over the world. You pass over and see the city— the big city lights of Neverwinter. You pass over the Sword Mountains and over—

speaker: Travis
lines: Is it more like Wonkavator-esque, or more like Chitty-Chitty-Bang-Bang-esque?

speaker: Griffin
lines: It’s kind of Wonkavator-esque. It’s kinda got that feel to it. Except glass, and spherical, and a hot air balloon. So not really anything like that.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: And I’d like to also point out to everybody that, in case of a water landing, our seats do serve as flotation devices.

speaker: Travis
lines: Do they also serve as toilets? ‘Cause I had a bunch of ale before we started the adventure…

speaker: Killian
lines: And a bunch of Luna Bars,

speaker: Griffin
lines: Killian says,

speaker: Killian
lines: Those things’ll clean you right out.

speaker: Griffin
lines: This episode’s brought to you by Luna bars. They’ll clean you completely out. Oh my god. It’s like you got a cheese-cloth in there, and you scrubbed it out real good.

speaker: Taako
lines: Guys, I just realized, I left my keys in Phandalin.

speaker: Taako
lines: How do you turn around?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Oh, my library books! I’m gonna have to pay for those!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You are floating higher and higher. You pass through the clouds that were overhead, and soon it’s just you and the night sky, and the two moons, and Killian says sort of bemusedly,

speaker: Killian
lines: You guys are gonna love what happens next!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Is it like a movie?

speaker: Killian
lines: Yes, we have an in-flight movie. It is, uh…

speaker: Taako
lines: Rush Hour 2, Rush Hour 2, Rush Hour 2, Rush Hour 2…

speaker: Killian
lines: It’s Rush Hour 3!

speaker: Taako
lines: No! That was a real misstep for the franchise.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You are [laughs] You are flying through the night sky. You‘re going ever-higher. And suddenly it kind of dawns on you that one of those two moons in the night sky is getting much larger than you thought it was going to, much faster than it was going to. You’re not really— you haven’t broken the stratosphere. You’re not in outer space, but it’s almost like you can reach out and touch the moon.

speaker: Merle
lines: That’s no moon.

speaker: Taako
lines: Guys, the moo—

speaker: Griffin
lines: I fucking knew somebody was going to make that goof, and you didn’t let me down. Thank you, my nerd, nerd-ass Dad.

speaker: Clint
lines: You’re welcome.

speaker: Taako
lines: Guys, the moon’s expanding!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Killian says—

speaker: Clint
lines: I just said it’s no moon.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Killian says—

lines: Magnus wakes up.

speaker: Magnus
lines: What’s going on?

speaker: Griffin
lines: You wake up just in time to see a portcullis…

speaker: Clint
lines: “Bridesmaids.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: Bridesmaids is starting. You just finished Rush Hour 3. Are any of you even paying any attention to the goddamn moon, or are you too busy watching the in-flight movie?

speaker: Clint
lines: I said it was no moon!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. You wake up Magnus, just in time to see a hole… a portcullis? Is that a word?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Ah! A portcullis!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Hold on, I—

speaker: Clint
lines: Yep!

speaker: Justin
lines: That’s like a castle gate, right?

lines: There’s an aperture that sort of slides open in the moon.

speaker: Travis
lines: Ew.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And it’s getting bigger and bigger and bigger.

speaker: Justin
lines: A porthole, a porthole.

speaker: Griffin
lines: A porthole. And suddenly you… have gone through it. You have gone into the moon, and you are surrounded by blackness. Inky, inky blackness. And Killian says,

speaker: Killian
lines: Well, guys. Hold onto your butts.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, I roll butt-holding.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, 14. I’m holding my butt.

lines: I grab my butt.

lines: I also grab my butt… and I talk with it.
